channel.title: I kinda need little help
channel.description: So i got bored and decided to work with 667 source but when i try to move an npc on unPackedSpawnsList.txt by changin the coords it dose not work, would someone please tell me what im doing wrong and how to fix this problem..

item.title: I kinda need little help
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

[quote=“extramax, post:4, topic:459535”]Yes, if u want to move or add npcs thers a line like this but maybe the codes are diffrent

World.spawnNPC(805, new WorldTile(3149, 3484, 0), -1, true, true);

u can just make 1 more like it
World.spawnNPC(Npc Code, new WorldTile(Coords, Coords, 0), -1, true, true);

for objects use this
World.spawnObject(new WorldObject(Object id Code, 10, 0, Coords Here, Coords Here, 0), true);

:)[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: I kinda need little help
item.dc:creator: @extramax extramax
item.description:
@extramax wrote:

Yes, if u want to move or add npcs thers a line like this but maybe the codes are diffrent

World.spawnNPC(805, new WorldTile(3149, 3484, 0), -1, true, true);

u can just make 1 more like it
World.spawnNPC(Npc Code, new WorldTile(Coords, Coords, 0), -1, true, true);

for objects use this
World.spawnObject(new WorldObject(Object id Code, 10, 0, Coords Here, Coords Here, 0), true);

Read full topic
